name: Andes Tower Hills
description: Andes Tower Hills has been a local family-owned ski resort since 1980 located in West Central Minnesota. It is located 15 miles west of Alexandria, 100 miles southeast of Fargo, North Dakota and 2 hours from Minneapolis. It offers 16 downhill runs for beginner, intermediate and expert skiers. It has a high-capacity snowmaking system that covers 100% of the ski area. There are 2 triple chairlifts, 1 quad chairlift, two carpet lifts and one high-speed rope tow. It has a reputation for being one of the first to open in the Fall and the last to close in the Spring in the entire Midwest.
